titleStmt.title: The emperour and the empire betray'd by whom and how written by a minister of state residing at that court to one of the Protestant princes of the empire.
Empereur et l'empire trahis, et par qui & comment. English. 1682
titleStmt.author: Cerdan, Jean-Paul, comte de.

notesStmt.note: "Published for the satisfaction of all good Protestants."
Attributed to Jean Paul Cerdan--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
